user_query: I need to integrate SMS functionality into my app. Can you provide me with a list of available numbers to receive messages from? Additionally, I would like to change the current tag for my messages and retrieve the details of a specific message using its ID.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of available numbers that can receive messages for SMS integration.
Change the current tag for messages to categorize them appropriately.
Retrieve the details of a specific message using its ID.
